name: Yusuf Aji Wibowo
biography: Hello, I was born and grew up in Ngawi, Indonesia. After high school, I took my computer science degree in University of Brawijaya in Malang, Indonesia. After graduated I move to Yogyakarta and started my career as a software developer. Mostly, I code in Kotlin on Android but also JavaScript once in a while. I also like running in the weekend and want to finish a half marathon again.
